system.description:
Engineering: using and maintaining of starship drives, powerplants, and other systems specific to starships. Engineering is the required skill for Jump drive operation. This skill is not a substitute for the Repair skill (below).

Examples: throw Engineering/EDU 8+ to estimate a shipâ€™s performance and tonnage. throw Engineering/INT 10+ to jury-rig a damaged power plant. More Engineering skill actions are presented in the Space Combat and Starship Operations chapters.
system.shortdescr: Using and maintaining of starship drives, powerplants, and other systems specific to starships
